ModMetaData.name: MorrowRim - The Sixth House
ModMetaData.author: SirMashedPotato
ModMetaData.description:
Dagoth Ur has once again returned, his cultists have established several outposts, and his power is constantly growing. Adds in the Sixth House faction, worshippers and children of Dagoth Ur, who will prove a dangerous enemy.

Also adds in a new storyteller, Dagoth Ur himself. Dagoth Ur will make you deal with several new dream incidents, constantly wearing down your colonists. At the same time The Sixth House will spread their influence, causing blights and claiming settlements. This will only stop once The Sixth House has been defeated.

-Supports Vanilla Achievements Expanded.
-Requires Harmony.
-Includes a patch for Communicable Diseases.
-Based on the 'Elder Scrolls' series by Bethesda Game Studios.
